title: ## Knowledge-Enriched Text Generation: A Reading List (2021 and Earlier
This list provides a diverse selection of articles on knowledge-enriched text generation, covering various aspects like knowledge integration, evaluation, and applications
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Survey**
A comprehensive survey of knowledge-based text generation techniques, covering knowledge representation, integration, and evaluation
Knowledge-Grounded Text Generation: A Survey**
A survey focusing on knowledge-grounded text generation, exploring different approaches and their applications
Neural Text Generation with External Knowledge**
Discusses the integration of external knowledge into neural text generation models, highlighting challenges and future directions
Knowledge-Enhanced Text Generation: A Survey**
A survey covering various knowledge-enhanced text generation techniques, including knowledge graph-based and retrieval-based approaches
Text Generation with External Knowledge: A Survey**
A survey focusing on the use of external knowledge in text generation, exploring different knowledge sources and integration methods
Knowledge-Grounded Dialogue Generation: A Survey**
A survey specifically on knowledge-grounded dialogue generation, covering techniques and challenges in this domain
A Survey of Knowledge-Based Text Generation**
A survey exploring the use of knowledge bases in text generation, covering different knowledge representation formats and integration methods
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Review**
A review of knowledge-based text generation techniques, focusing on the role of knowledge in improving text quality and coherence
Knowledge-Grounded Neural Text Generation**
Discusses the use of neural networks for knowledge-grounded text generation, exploring different architectures and training methods
Text Generation with Knowledge Graphs**
Explores the use of knowledge graphs in text generation, focusing on techniques for extracting and integrating knowledge from graphs
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Tutorial**
A tutorial providing an introduction to knowledge-based text generation, covering basic concepts and techniques
Knowledge-Enhanced Text Generation: A Framework**
Presents a framework for knowledge-enhanced text generation, outlining key components and their interactions
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Case Study**
A case study demonstrating the application of knowledge-based text generation in a specific domain
Knowledge-Driven Text Generation: A New Paradigm**
Introduces a new paradigm for text generation, emphasizing the role of knowledge in guiding the generation process
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Comparative Study**
A comparative study of different knowledge-based text generation techniques, evaluating their performance and limitations
Knowledge-Enhanced Text Generation: A Practical Approach**
Presents a practical approach to knowledge-enhanced text generation, focusing on techniques for integrating knowledge into existing text generation systems
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Probabilistic Approach**
Introduces a probabilistic approach to knowledge-based text generation, using statistical models to represent and reason about knowledge
Knowledge-Driven Text Generation: A Logic-Based Approach**
Presents a logic-based approach to knowledge-driven text generation, using logical rules to represent and manipulate knowledge
Knowledge-Based Text Generation: A Rule-Based Approach**
Introduces a rule-based approach to knowledge-based text generation, using predefined rules to generate text from knowledge
Knowledge-Enhanced Text Generation: A Survey of Evaluation Metrics**
A survey of evaluation metrics used for assessing the quality of knowledge-enhanced text generation systems
**Note:** This list is not exhaustive and focuses on articles published up to
You can find more recent articles by searching for "knowledge-enriched text generation
container-title: on academic databases like Google Scholar, ACM Digital Library, and IEEE Xplore

title: * **Search for specific keywords:** Use keywords like "knowledge graph
container-title: "knowledge base," "external knowledge," "factual consistency," "knowledge-grounded," "dialogue generation," and "text summarization" to refine your search
* **Explore conference proceedings:** Conferences like ACL, NAACL, EMNLP, and AAAI often feature cutting-edge research on knowledge-enriched text generation

title: * **Follow researchers in the field:** Many researchers in this area have personal websites or blogs where they share their latest work and insights
This reading list should provide a good starting point for your exploration of knowledge-enriched text generation
